channel.title: Assistance required on item requirments
channel.description:
To begin I'm running on the Project16v6 source and I'm using the client source released by GalkonsPride and my problem is when i try to equip a dragon 2h sword it states "You Need 60 Defense to equip this" and i figured it was just a miss print so i ignored it got my atk to 60 and tried again but same problem occurred so it does in fact require defense. So I've been researching custom items in the hope it would shine some light on this problem but I have yet to find where the item stat requirements lie. To get to the point I'd appreciate if someone could point me in the right direction towards their location or even client or server side would help greatly, I'm not looking for a hand out but rather guidance as I'd like to learn the way of.
Cheers DG

item.title: Assistance required on item requirments
item.dc:creator: @darkgriever2 darkgriever2
item.description:
@darkgriever2 wrote:

To begin I’m running on the Project16v6 source and I’m using the client source released by GalkonsPride and my problem is when i try to equip a dragon 2h sword it states “You Need 60 Defense to equip this” and i figured it was just a miss print so i ignored it got my atk to 60 and tried again but same problem occurred so it does in fact require defense. So I’ve been researching custom items in the hope it would shine some light on this problem but I have yet to find where the item stat requirements lie.
